item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260106.6)
item.description:
What's New

fix: allow W key for O+A and U+O patterns when Free Mark is OFF

Previously, when Free Mark was disabled, the W key was rejected whenever

there were unmodified vowels before the last character. This was too

restrictive and blocked valid Vietnamese words like "hoặc" and "được".

The issue was that the check didn't consider HOW insertW() would actually

modify the vowels. insertW() has specific logic for different vowel pairs:

  • U+O → both vowels get modified (ươ) - should be ALLOWED
  • O+A → only second vowel (v2) modified (oă) - should be ALLOWED
  • I+O → only second vowel (v2) modified (iơ) - should be ALLOWED
  • U+A, U+I, U+U, O+I → only first vowel (v1) modified - should be REJECTED

The fix now checks the actual vowel pattern and only rejects when insertW()

would modify an earlier vowel (v1 only), which is true "free mark" behavior.

Examples now working with Free Mark OFF:

  • h+o+a+w+j+c → "hoặc" ✓ (was "hoawjc")
  • d+d+u+o+w+j+c → "được" ✓ (was "đuowjc")
  • t+u+o+i+w → "tươi" ✓

Still correctly rejected (must type W immediately after vowel):

  • u+a+w → "uaw" (should type u+w+a for "ưa")
  • o+i+w → "oiw" (should type o+w+i for "ơi")

Other changes:

  • Add getFocusedElementTextValue() and isFocusedElementEmpty() to AppBehaviorDetector
  • Reset mid-sentence flag when clicking into overlay app with empty input
  • Add resetMidSentenceFlag() to KeyboardEventHandler
  • Remove duplicate getFocusedTextViaAX() from DebugViewModel
  • Fix MacroSection UI alignment for "Thêm" button
  • Bump version to 20260106.6
